name: Rocksmith 2014: Blues Song Pack
summary: Play "Spoonful” by Howlin’ Wolf, "Boom Boom” by John Lee Hooker, “Hide Away” by Freddie King, “Ain’t No Love In The Heart of the City” by Bobby “Blue” Bland, and "Be Careful With a Fool” by Johnny Winter on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.
